Uses of Package
com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf.running_line

  • Packages that use com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf.running_line 
    Package Description
    com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf  
    com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf.running_line  
  • Classes in com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf.running_line used by com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf 
    Class and Description
    HorseJockey
    The horse and jockey for this Starter
    LastRaced
    Stores the LocalDate instance of the last race date, the number of days between this race date and then, and the Track, race number, and finishing position of the Starter's last performance (if applicable and they exist)
    MedicationEquipment
    Stores the text summary of the medication and equipment used in this race by the Starter, and also contains list for each individual MedicationEquipment.Medication and MedicationEquipment.Equipment instance
    Odds
    The value of the Starter (expressed within a Double value field) and a boolean to note if the starter was favorite
    Weight
    Stores the weight carried by the horse (net) and the jockey allowance (due to apprenticeship)
  • Classes in com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf.running_line used by com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf.running_line 
    Class and Description
    HorseJockey
    The horse and jockey for this Starter
    HorseJockey.MissingHorseJockeyException 
    LastRaced
    Stores the LocalDate instance of the last race date, the number of days between this race date and then, and the Track, race number, and finishing position of the Starter's last performance (if applicable and they exist)
    LastRaced.LastRacePerformance
    The Track, race number, and finishing position of the Starter's last performance (if applicable and they exist)
    LastRaced.UnknownTrackException 
    MedicationEquipment
    Stores the text summary of the medication and equipment used in this race by the Starter, and also contains list for each individual MedicationEquipment.Medication and MedicationEquipment.Equipment instance
    MedicationEquipment.Equipment
    Equipment used on race day by a Starter
    MedicationEquipment.Medication
    Medications used on race day by a Starter
    Odds
    The value of the Starter (expressed within a Double value field) and a boolean to note if the starter was favorite
    RunningLineColumnIndex
    Tracks the location of the first character of a running line column header so that it can be used with TreeSet.floor(Object) to associate ChartCharacters with particular columns in a grid
    RunningLineHeader.MalformedRaceException 
    Weight
    Stores the weight carried by the horse (net) and the jockey allowance (due to apprenticeship)
